abstract: Motorola said on Monday that it has agreed to nominate two of Carl C. Icahn’s director candidates for its board, marking another victory for the activist investor at the struggling phone company.
lead_paragraph: Motorola said on Monday that it has agreed to nominate two of Carl C. Icahn’s director candidates for its board, marking another victory for the activist investor at the struggling phone company.

headline.main: Motorola Agrees to Seat 2 Icahn Board Nominees
